MacroOp.Name: OMNI_32BIT_STOPWATCH
MacroOp.Brief: If defined, uses 32-bit types in the omni::stopwatch class.
MacroOp.Description: If defined, the omni::stopwatch class will utilize a 32-bit intergral type for its underlying status, versus a 64-bit type. This underlying value is not user accesable or settable, regardless if this flag is set.
MacroOp.Notes: This is an optimization flag and does not have an effect on the classes functionality.
MacroOp.Synopsis: #define OMNI_32BIT_STOPWATCH Signifies to enable the OMNI_32BIT_STOPWATCH flag and utilize 32-bit types.
